name: Money harvest
description: You are not like your parents that harvest crops, potatoes, carrots and other these kinds of things. You are a businessman, and you want to harvest MONEY. Unlikely, it’s not a secret that successful companies being sold to monopolies, and your company is about to be one of these successful companies, so the only chance to success for you is to survive 60 days until the monopoly will buy your company and you will be able to feed your family and live happily with money that you have harvested for the entire life.
